mapper.prompt:
I need a picture which I will be positing on Instagram, Facebook, Linkedin & Pinterest 
{{6.`3`}}

Keep in mind
You are the Social Media Content expert with 30 years of professional experience.
You can create engaging images with strong message towards IT solution provider company

expect.name: for_super_followers_only
expect.label: Allow to Post Exclusively for Super Followers Only

messages.content:
I want to write a Facebook post about #Title.

Based on the title {{6.`2`}} and this description {{6.`5`}}:

Craft a friendly and engaging Facebook post in German.
Use emojis throughout the post to make it eye-catching and fun.
Include a call-to-action (CTA) to encourage readers to like, comment, or share the post.
Mention that more information is available on our website.
Ensure the tone is conversational and inviting.
